title: How to Check Your Child's Math Homework?
excerpt: Should you correct every mistake? How to give constructive feedback? A guide for the checking parent.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
Don't Be the Red-Pen Teacher

Instead of marking a big X on a mistake, make a small circle and ask: "Are you sure about this answer? Try checking again."

Use our worksheets with the "Show Answers" button for checking together.
